question: Which among the following statements is not correct ?
option1: Phoenix Ashram was founded by Mahatma Gandhi
option2: Life Divine is a work of Aurobindo Ghosh
option3: in 1765 British acquired the Diwani of Bengal, Bihar and Orissa
explanation: Phoenix Ashram was established by Mahatma Gandhi in Durban in 1904. The Life Divine was written by Sri Aurobindo and it was published in 1919. The Treaty of Allahabad was signed on 12 August 1765 between Shah Alam II and Clive. Shah Alam II granted the East India Company Diwani rights of Bengal, Bihar and Orissa.
